title: Newport Coast Clothing Boutique - Excellent E2 Visa Opportunity
description: Currently owned by a E2 VISA holder, who bought it for their VISA approval. Excellent books and records, a must see This is a beautiful, high end boutique located within the highly sought after, affluent & prestigious beach side community of Newport Coast.

title: Restaurant Catering Real Estate
description: Exceptional opportunity to acquire a well- known restaurant brand along with the real estate on a major thoroughfare. Name is trademarked. Take-out and corporate catering make up a large percentage of the volume. Name and concept has been providing delicious and unique American cuisine in Orange County for over 35 years.

title: Limousine and Party Bus Service
description: Great opportunity to own a profitable, high net, low over heads, well-established, limousine service business. This Limousine Service has over twelve(12) years of experience serving the Inland Empire area and offers excellent rates, professional service, fully equipped limousines with experienced chauffeurs.

title: Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery Franchise
description: Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery, where good times are always on tap. That's because it's more than just a restaurant, and so much more than a sports bar, festive atmosphere makes us the go-to place to watch sports, enjoy a cold beer and hang out with friends
